amendment.description: Amendment allows the Secretary of State, at her discretion, to make payments from the Rewards for Justice Program to officers or employees of foreign governments who provide information leading to the capture of exceptional and high-profile terrorists.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part C of House Report 111-143 to allow the Secretary of State, at her discretion, to make payments from the Rewards for Justice program to officers or employees of foreign governments who provide information leading to the capture of exceptional and high-profile terrorists.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kirk amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 428 - 3 (Roll no. 326).
